trends: There has been one other sighting in Troy
There were no other sightings in Troy on or around February 25th 2008
divs: sighting detailshello, im not sure how to ask this, but i was wondering if anyone else reported a large, round, florescent green object flying in the sky over i35 around troy, tx area about 12:35 am 2\25\08? i know how this sounds and am just curious to know what this was? my fianc'e was riding back from austin with me when we noticed this. it appeared to be coming toward the ground at a very high rate of speed. it almost looked like it was about to crash, then it just seemed to be headed towards the ground when we lost sight of it????!!@! it looked bigger than a car, and that was from a distance so who knows the true dimensions, it was rounded and bright, florecent green. it was way to big to be a firework, and well we really couldn't put together anything it might have been? there where several cars on the road in front of us, so somebody had to have seen it as well, like i said we are pretty puzzeled and would like to know what that was? any idea's, or other reports?
Summary: WTF? Large, Round, Florecent Green, Flying Object Central TEXAS
